Package guiRole1

Class ViewRole1Home

java.lang.Object
guiRole1.ViewRole1Home
public class ViewRole1Home extends Object

Title: GUIReviewerHomePage Class.

Description: The Java/FX-based Student Home Page. The page is a stub for some role needed for the application. The widgets on this page are likely the minimum number and kind for other role pages that may be needed.

  • Method Details

    • displayRole1Home

      public static void displayRole1Home(javafx.stage.Stage ps, entityClasses.User user)

      Method: displayRole1Home(Stage ps, User user)

      Description: This method is the single entry point from outside this package to cause the Student Home page to be displayed. It first sets up every shared attributes so we don't have to pass parameters. It then checks to see if the page has been setup. If not, it instantiates the class, initializes all the static aspects of the GIUI widgets (e.g., location on the page, font, size, and any methods to be performed). After the instantiation, the code then populates the elements that change based on the user and the system's current state. It then sets the Scene onto the stage, and makes it visible to the user.

      Parameters:
      ps - specifies the JavaFX Stage to be used for this GUI and it's methods
      user - specifies the User for this GUI and it's methods
